name: little rat wizard
description:
Help little rat wizard return to their true size! You're a rat & a wizard, but you've accidentally messed up a spell that made you a little bit too small (oh no)! You can't do spells with those tiny rat hands!! Find the potion to return to your true size so you can keep doing silly little rat magic!

This is my submission for my first game jam (Mini Jame Gam #8)! The theme was magic & special object was bottle. Everything (but SFX) has been made from scratch over a very short time frame (2ish days) & was completed solo!

Controls: arrows to move, wasd for camera, space to pick up

Known bugs: Replay button doesn't work on every load & items falling through floor.

*Not playable on mobile devices!

SFX: lofi world vol 17
